price: 84. Hij zei: “Zij zijn vlak achter mij en ik haast mij tot U O mijn Heer, dat U tevreden moge zijn.”
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla hum ulāi ʿalā atharī waʿajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarḍā
